import { IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonMenu, IonList, IonItem, IonRouterOutlet, IonMenuButton, IonButtons, IonButton, IonCardContent, IonModal, IonSearchbar, } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Blog: React.FC = () => { const [article, setArticle] = useState([]); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [content, setContent] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const showModal = (id: any) => { setIsOpen(true); } return ( <>

Recent Articles Post

{article.map((item: any, i: any) =>

showModal(item.id)}>{item.title}

<>
{title}
setIsOpen(false)} > Back

{title}

{date}

{item.date}

)}
); } export default Blog;
